content.text: 0) In a saucepan over low heat, mix the brown sugar, chile sauce, rum, soy sauce, ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, garlic, dry mustard, and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "mix"@32:35 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the brown sugar"@36:51 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "chile sauce"@53:64 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "rum"@66:69 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "soy sauce"@71:80 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "ketchup"@82:89 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "Worcestershire sauce"@91:111 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "garlic"@113:119 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "dry mustard"@121:132 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "pepper"@138:144 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a saucepan"@6:16 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "low heat"@22:30 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Simmer"@3:9 / AC
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "30 minutes"@10:20 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:simultaneous ( ac-1-1 "stirring"@22:30 / AC )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Cool, and refrigerate until ready to use.
